name: Moto Mouse Stunt Mania
description:
Moto Mouse Mania is a fun adventure and action racing game with cute little mouse with different bikes and nice animation. Not all Mice should be hated and after all this one is a cute and loveable. Now it's your job to look after it and make sure it gets its cheese on the way. Complete multiple levels and play with the danger as the mice do all the time.Be careful this might not be so easy but a challenge and risk worth taking! Good luck!
This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will Wow you and awesome hurdles which will put driving skills to test.
Features:
-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behaviour to the bike and rider.
-Multiple Terrains
-Multiple Bikes to select from
-Unique and smooth gameplay
- Addictive , exciting and hard levels
publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private
